treatment.description: Roots fibrous or fleshy. Leaves: petiole 1/2–2/3 or equaling blade length; blade dark red to green, usually with pronounced midrib, somewhat fleshy. Inflorescences cymes, 1–8-flowered, interrupted towards base. Perianth urn-shaped; segments 3–5 × 2–3 mm; receptacle pelviform. Achenes 5–11 per cluster, 3–5 mm. Seeds 1.5–2 mm.

key_statement.statement: Basal leaves usually longer than 10 cm; stems erect; cymes 2–8-flowered; roots swollen, fleshy
Basal leaves shorter than 10 cm; stems procumbent to erect;cymes 1–3-flowered; roots fibrous to ± swollen, not fleshy
